GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.211
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: fix null deref due to zeroed list head

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.211 by commit a452bc3deb23bf93f8a13d3e24611b7ef39645dc, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 55dd6f93076bb82aa8911191125418dcfcbf2c9b. For more details please see the references link.
